You had a reputation as the "Shrinking Ninja" around these parts. Mostly because your enemy couldn't see you and you'd flee before things got ugly. But after a previous run in, an enemy had turned off your chakra switches, and you used the last of your chakra available to shrink and flee. Unfortunately for you, you were now trapped this way until someone was able to restart your chakra production. Which would be really hard, at this size.

Not to mention you were now trapped in a world of giants. Every person you saw was huge, and it as hard to recognize people because staring upwards would be blinding due to the sun.

You had no where else to turn, and you were stuck living in the shadows. You cursed your jutsu choice and regretted using the last of your chakra to shrink. But maybe someone could help you--That's right! There was a sensitive kid around here who you met before. What was his name....Hane? Naren? Haru? You couldn't remember and nothing you thought of seemed right. But he had never seen you at this size before. How were you supposed to find him, and how was he supposed to see you?

You didn't have very many options so you figured you should at least try. You'd have to listen to people and see if you could gather information about where he lived.

After hesitantly entering Konoha, you were frightened by the constant poudning of sandals. Kids kicked up dust as they ran along and adults set their feet down firmly. You swallowed. Crawling on a building had gotten you mistaken for a bug multiple times, but staying on the ground would be worse. How were you supposed to get around?

Maybe you could hitch a ride. Yeah, like anyone was gonna notice a small little dude on their pants leg. You jumped to the nearest person and slid in the folds of their pants around their ankle. You assumed it was a boy from this, and considering how the person you were looking for hung around kids sometimes, maybe they'd know something.

You stayed in place for awhile, trying to listen to what the kids were saying. Finally, something caught your ears.

"Hey, there's Naruto! Let's see if he has something to teach us!" The kid chirped.

Naruto! That was it! That was his name! And now you were headed in the right direction! Yes!

The kid suddenly picked up pace and you flew out of the fold and onto the road. Oh no! You didn't know where to go from here. Was chasing after the kid possible?
You tailed the kid as fast as you could, and stopped when he did. 3 kids are circled around someone sitting down. But you couldn't see the head of the person.

They began talking, and you definitely recognized Naruto's voice. It looked like a long climb up, but hopefully he'd tell these kids off soon so you could try to get his attention.

"No, I got nothing. I'm gonna take a nap after I finish eating. Sorry guys." He replied to the kids. The kids whined and begged for Naruto to play with them but he politely refused. "I'm tired. Maybe another day." He said, with a yawn.

You suddenly felt a little hesitant. Surely Naruto wouldn't turn you down because he was tired, right?

You watched the kids walk away, leaving you with a view of his backside.

You weren't sure what to do now. You had two options:

1153221.content:
"Alright, good work today, you three," Kurenai spoke, smiling warmly at her three former pupils. "I know we aren't an official squad anymore, but it's nice to get together like this and see how far your skills have progressed. All three of you have shown remarkable growth."

Her praise cause Hinata to flush and look to the ground modestly, while Kiba puffed out his chest. Shino didn't appear to do anything at all, but those who knew him would be able to detect a pleasant buzzing noise humming near his presence.

"Hell yeah!" Kiba shouted, enthused as always. "You bet we've gotten better! It's been a while since we last trained, sensei, don't act surprised!" He looked away, muttering under his breath, "though I still gotta beat that dead last Naruto..."

Kurenai examined him, a rather mischievous smile on her lips. "Well, Kiba, it's convenient that you mention that. I've been meaning to work on the weakness that cost you that match in the chunin exams."

Kiba growled. "Sensei, c'mon! How could I have prepared for a fuckin' fart?"

Kurenai poked him on the nose, causing him to jerk back, grumbling. She looked meaningfully at Hinata, who looked redder than she had in years. Shino raised a brow. Kurenai spoke. "I know how exactly. Shino, you may leave." The bug-user, though curious, detected the command in her tone. He left with an easy wave towards his comrades. "Kiba," Kurenai said seriously, "your nose is a great asset, and its sensitivity has ensured the success of many missions. However. You've proven that it can also be exposed as a weakness, one that you need to work on if you want to boost your survivability as a ninja."

Kiba sighed, irritated but understanding the point. "And how the hell do you expect me to do that? Unless you've got a fart machine on your hands, it's gonna be tough to fix. And why the hell did you make Shino leave?" he asked with suspicion.

Kurenai looked directly at Hinata, who appeared to want the ground to swallow her up. Kiba's ears pricked as he detected...a growling? No, a gurgling. He assessed Hinata, whose arm was gripping her stomach. She seemed uncomfortable. Kiba looked at her in concern, before realization dawned.

"No way. You want Hinata....to fart on me? Sensei, have you gone insane!?" Kiba shrieked, while Kurenai glared at him. Hinata threw her face in her hands in embarrassment.

"Yes. I figured you would want a close friend doing the deed, as it would hardly be appropriate if I were the one. Besides that, Shino's bugs don't allow him to expel flatulence. And Hinata's gas is naturally the most potent-- I've shared a tent with her after beans, after all," She shot a teasing glance at Hinata, who burst out with a loud 'S-sensei!' of humiliation. Kurenai continued, "Hinata is also willing, if reluctant." She gave Hinata an encouraging pat on the head. She blushed deeper.

"W-well...Kiba, um, I understand the...importance...of you building up...olfactory endurance," she managed to look him in the eye, "And I...want to do all I can a-as a teammate to help you...even if that thing is...erm, breaking wind."

Kiba, though disgusted at the prospect, was touched. "Y-yeah. Whatever. Do you even have to...y'know..right now?"

Hinata nodded shyly. Kurenai snorted. "Why do you think I only had her do some stretches? Gets the gas moving around, but enough to control. Didn't want her letting any out on accident. Those are all yours, Kiba."

The dog-boy made a face. "Great. I'd imagine we can't do this in public?"

Kurenai rolled her eyes, and Hinata looked mortified. "Of course not. You can do it at my house since we don't have to worry about clansmen interfering. Plenty of food will be stocked in order to keep Hinata's gas going."

Kiba looked to the skies, dreading the evening he was about to have. "Fine. Just....go easy at first, okay? Lead the fuckin' way."

1321111.content:
You were so excited. Finally, you reached the small city of Magnolia, you weren't a wizard but you always dreamed of visiting this place and seeing the infamous Fairy Tail guild in person. Sighing in happiness you trudge forward looking around at your surroundings with a smile, the place was beautiful. The streets were bustling and full of life, you stared endlessly at the forever moving sight before you. It seemed as if it was one of the best things you've ever seen.

Natsu was grumbling to himself, Happy had decided to go on a mission with Wendy, Carla and Erza; while Lucy and Gray went on another mission. He kicked the rubble beneath his feet and glared out the ground, he want in the best mood right now and most people sensed this and moved out of the dragon slayer's way. But alas you were in your own world, not paying attention to your surroundings. Your daydreams about the guild were cut off when you ran into what was like a boiling hot wall.

What you looked up at was a lean, muscular young man of average height with a slightly tan skin tone, black eyes, spiky pink-colored hair, and has abnormally sharp canines. His outfit consists of a sleeveless, gold trimmed, black waistcoat, often left open and untucked, exposing his bare chest, a gold trimmed, black cloth around his waist that reaches his knees, held by a leather brown belt with an oval-shaped silver buckle, white knee-length trousers with black ribbon ties, a thick black wristband on his left wrist, black open-toed sandals and the scale-patterned scarf. You were astonished, you thought you knew who this was and your theories were correct the you saw the male's red guild mark, located just below his right shoulder. It was the Salamander, Natsu Dragneel.

"Hey! Answer me you idiot!" You totally forgot he was talking to you, losing yourself in your own world was a big mistake. Most the people that were nearby decided to try and avoid the conflict and moved away. Watching all this, you still didn't speak, you were just so terrified. "Fine." He said, narrowing his eyes. "As Happy and everyone else left me I guess you'll have to spend time with me." You didn't have a chance to reply before he effortlessly threw you over his shoulder and started heading towards his home.

Finally you reached the door of the wizard's house, "Here we are, home sweet home." He said with a smirk, grabbing you from his shoulder and dragging you by the collar. Dragging you into the house, he slammed the door behind him, pulling you to a door down a hallway. When he opened you were hit with a wake of masculine scent, it was definitely a teenage male's bedroom. He quickly threw you on the floor of his bedroom and you rolled into a pile of potent and damp clothes.

He walked over to you and slammed his body on your chest, effectively sitting on you. He was quite heavy and you could barely move, "Get... Off..." You try to say but you were too weak at the moment from all the events that quickly occurred.

"Listen, name's Natsu. You won't be speaking now cause you decided not to before." He said looking at you devilishly, then you felt a warmness envelop your chest, You look up to see Natsu surprised and slightly blushing, you didn't really get it until a strong scent of rotten meat hit you, the wizard just farted on your chest. You immediately started retching and dry heaving from the smell, it was inhuman! Natsu was embarrassed at first but when he saw your reaction his feeling's changed, he had always had extra flatulence but never thought to use it... For something like this! A devious smirk crossed his face as he turned himself around, you barely had enough time to react before he curtly scooted his muscled ass onto your face!

The stench was indescribable, a deep, sulfurous plume, that rushed to his head and instantly made him feel light-headed, not nauseous, but hazy. With that, Panty's muscles tightened as she clenched and grunted in effort, more of the toxic gas was added to the dwindling supply in the room. Brief continued to breath in the harsh substance, but his vision was starting to blur and the Panty's word were starting to sound fuzzy in his ears, in his delirium a sheepish smile has grown on his face and he began to meekly giggle as he nonetheless kept inhaling deeper and deeper.

Stocking crossed her arms as she explained her reasoning, “That creep collected your boogers, I have no doubt he wouldn’t somehow like it, or even if he didn’t he’d put up with it just for the prospect of getting with you.” Panty sighed, “Yeah, you’ve got me there… Hmm. Panty’s face twisted into a grimace, “Hey, don’t you be so sure, bitch, need I fucking remind you I got covered head to toe in literal shit in front of a crowd and I’ve still been getting laid whenever I damn well… hold on a minute.” Panty was interrupted by a rumbling in her gut, she looked over on the coach to see Chuck sitting gormlessly as usual at the end. Stocking pointed at Chuck’s body and exclaimed, “See!? Not even he enjoys what you’re putting out and he eats his own shit!” Panty scoffed, “Eh, what do you know?... Ugh, but you’re right, this might be a bit harder than I initially think. Lemme mull it over for a minute, alright?”

1522122.content:
Nagisa wasn't feeling well today. He was good at hiding it, but he had an immense pressure knocking at the back door. The pressure was enormous, though he felt as if he tried even a little to relieve himself he would regret it. His bowel groans were mistaken as stomach growls, and he was able to convince everyone who teased him he just missed breakfast. Lunch was so far away, and that was the only time he could escape outside. Going in the bathroom would be far too risky. Nagisa sighed as he looked out the window. He wanted to lean on the windowsill, but he knew if he did there would be trouble.

"Hazuki!" A familiar voice called out to him. He jumped, the motion launching a barely noticeable poot! from his backside as he adjusted his position to face whoever's feet were tapping up to him.

"Oh, Rei. You don't have to use my surname, we're friends!" He cajoled, the pressure much worse now. He and Rei had met not too long ago and weren't that familiar with each other yet, but Rei seemed to show some attachment to him.

"Are you alright?" Rei inquired, tilting his head sympathetically.

"Don't worry about it." Nagisa chuckled, attempting to reassure his pal.

"You're looking quite pale, Nagisa! You should try to sleep sooner." Rei scolded.

"I couldn't, I procrastinated on a project...You know I hate studying, too..." Nagisa yawned.

"I'll walk with you to your homeroom, in case you get sick." Rei declared.

"That's..." He began. He was going to say "That's not necessary" but decided that it would be less humiliating if he cut the cheese by accident when Rei was around. Rei might even comfort him.

"Very kind, thank you." He beamed, flashing a wide grin. At that moment, his guts let out a sound indescribable by use of an onomatopoeia.

"It's like you have a rabid dog inside of you." Rei winced, looking down at Nagisa's belly.

Nagisa forced himself to suppress a laugh, knowing that if he made any sort of careless movement...

"Pff...Yeah. A-Anyway, let's get going! No sense in standing around, right?" He cheered, taking a dramatic step forward, feeling the pressure get even lower, then immediately closing his legs. "This is bad..." He mumbled to himself.

Rei walked up to him, eyeing him suspiciously, but not saying anything. Nagisa was sure that it would be easier to contain once he was sitting in a chair. It had to be! He began long-boarding to class, Rei confusedly trying to match his pace. Nagisa was worried that Rei might interpret this as him trying to get away, so he stopped for a moment. Face bashful, cheeks red, and eyes frantic, he turned to Rei.

"Thanks for coming with me, Rei. I'm just in a bit of a hurry, heh heh!" He chirped. Rei gave a solemn, but concerned nod.

Nagisa's anus contorted suddenly, and he lunged his pelvis forward in a last ditch attempt to squeeze his buttocks together.

"...What're you doing?" Rei asked.

"I just...almost slipped! Is all. Ha!" Nagisa lied.

"I understand." Rei replied.

They continued the awkward strut to Nagisa's homeroom. Nagisa could feel Rei's eyes on him, and felt like Rei might know at this point. Nagisa grumbled under his breath, hoping it wasn't obvious. Rei didn't seem to notice.

"We're here." Rei announced.

"Mhm! Yeah. Thanks again, Rei. I would've never made it." Nagisa hurriedly uttered.

"You're welcome. Nagisa, do you want to meet after school today by the pool?" Rei suggested.

"Oh, are you going to try the butterfly again?" Nagisa asked, his voice starting to waver.

"N, no, there's something else." Rei stated, his face a little aloof and pinkish.

Nagisa desperately wanted to stay and tease him more, or at least find out, but his anal seal was about to burst! He had to sit down quick!

"Okay!" Nagisa beamed. "See you later!" He cooed.

Rei turned to walk away, holding his hand up and giving Nagisa a wave as he ventured to his class down the hall.

Nagisa quickly strode into class and planted his weary bottom in the chair.

Almost immediately, the relief was granted. Nagisa had never felt so glad to sit down in his life! What had he even eaten to give him such a punishing amount of gas? He couldn't even remember what he had snacked on while he worked on his project...

Homeroom began shortly after, but after morning announcements Nagisa started to feel uneasy again. This time because a test was being handed out.

Squeaks and groans from Nagisa's plump backside cut like knives into the mandatory silent atmosphere. Classmate's heads turned to look over at him, he couldn't help but feel flustered he was making such a ruckus. He wasn't even trying today! Usually it was his mouth making noise, not his butt!

10 minutes into the test, Nagisa's bottom let out a particularly loud grumble. The homeroom teacher walking around stopped at his desk.

"Mr. Hazuki, did you forget to eat today?" She asked, quietly.

Nagisa stared at her, wondering if he should use this opportunity to tell her he desperately needed the toilet.

15221222.content:
"Oh, is that so? I know you can't quite help it, but you're being a disruption. If you'd like, after you finish your test, you can go to your locker." She suggested, smiling.

Nagisa gave her a blank stare, then it clicked in his head. She thinks I have a packed lunch, he thought. He smiled and nodded, quietly thanking her. As she continued her stroll, he began to wonder if he could sneak outside during this time period. If he finished his test quickly, he would be allowed to his locker near the entrance of the school. If he walked out the front entrance it'd be obvious...He suddenly remembered the pool locker room led directly outside, but it was on the opposite side of the building...He'd have to hurry!

Staring down at the test in his hand, he had only finished the first of four pages...he began to feel discouraged. His parents were nagging him at home and they spent forever studying for this test with him...he couldn't rush it over something like this, but he would at least try to write quickly.

Finally, he set his pencil down and heaved a sigh. He was finished...Oh, but he should double check his answers very quickly, just in ca--

The P.A. announcement came on and briefly announced the class period was over.

Nagisa's mouth instantly formed an intense frown, and his stomach bubbled angrily.

As he marched up to his teacher's desk to turn in his test, she gave him a sympathetic look as he strode out of the room.

Nagisa was irritated and the pressure wasn't dying down any...just what was inside of him?!

--

After suffering through 3 more periods, he finally was able to go to lunch.

As he tried to sneakily make his way to the back of the school, he was stopped again.

"Hazuki!" A feminine voice called.

He didn't bother turning around, because he knew that she was going to jog up to and bounce in front of him regardless.

"Hey! Haven't seen you in a day or two. How come you weren't at practice?" She asked.

"Sorry, Gou--" Nagisa began.

"Kou. It's Kou." She interrupted.

She puffed her cheeks out. "You should really stay on top of your work. If you have a failing grade, you'll have to quit the club, you know."

"I know...But, l really gotta go, so please excuse me!" He cried, dashing past her.

Gou was left with a blank expression on her face. "That's unlike him...What does he have to do?" She wondered, aloud.

Nagisa, running with his legs as close as he could get them, was finally able to get outside. Not a soul was out on the athletic fields at this time. He sighed happily, and took his merry time walking to the small forested area outside of the fields, a skip in his step. When he felt he was far enough away to not be noticed, he knelt down and leaned forward, as if using a floor toilet.

Finally, he felt his asshole open, and a blast louder than a desk dragging across a tiled floor sputtered out of him. Birds flew out of their nests and away, as it grossly rippled out of him. It soon trailed off into an aggressive hiss, then a gentle whisper.

Nagisa released his breath and panted heavily. He couldn't believe that just happened. He was humiliated by the sound his body produced.

Nagisa tensed as another fart suddenly pushed at his rear.

"You're kidding!" He protested. A simple sound, not as massive as the other, trumpeted out of him as he expelled it.

Why don't I have to use the bathroom at all? Why just this? he thought.

Nagisa again, felt a large pressure in his backside.

"No way! It's not...coming back, is it?" He wondered.

After testing it 3 more times, Nagisa released a cry of anguish. What on earth was happening?! How long would this last?! What if it lasted the rest of his life?! A look of horror split across his face.

Checking his cell, he realized his lunch was almost over and he didn't even get to eat...Though, maybe I shouldn't eat, he thought.

(Restart of a story by 'kirihito'. I didn't write anything below, own anything nor make claim to anything!)

IMPORTANT: Any additions made by me WERE NOT actually written by me, unless I specifically state otherwise in the chapter!

this story is about anime (or any other type of ting such as videogames and american cartoons) characters torturing other characters or you for that matter with their farts. If you don't like the concept of farts change the story to you see fit Have fun and I allow shrinking and growing. Please Please do not be vauge with your chapters I will delete them and by vauge I mean He/She kicked him/her then... Seriously that takes away the fun I have reading your additions

Here is an example of how to start The story. For example lets use naruto and kiba. Kiba was relaxing when suddenly a enemy ninja appeared and shrank him with a shrinking jutsu shrinking him to 2 inches suddenly naruto came over looking to return his kunai when he saw the shrunken kiba. naruto got a grin on his face as he picked up kiba and took him to his home.

See that is just an example You can make it anyway you want and I would prefer if there WAS DIALOUGE in the story

I am giving away 500 points for good entries

See if you can get the characters around to eventually enjoying themselves...
